articles.title: Randy Travis's stagehand, 68, is 'shot dead by his wife as she claims he cheated on her' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Nashville stagehand Thomas Roberts, 68, who worked with country music legend Randy Travis for two decades was allegedly shot dead by his wife who told police he was cheating on her.
articles.content:
A renowned Nashville stagehand who worked with country music legend Randy Travis for two decades was allegedly shot dead by his wife - who told police she did it because he was cheating on her.
